main_address_raw_text: 6 howcroft court, wakefield, west yorkshire, wf2 6tp
locations: gb, united kingdom, england, wakefield, wf2 6tp, howcroft court, 6, 53.6506138, -1.484488611551266
short_description: forged spirits is a distilleries & malt processing company based in wakefield, united kingdom.
long_description: we use the finest ingredients to create award winning yorkshire gin, vodka and rum. our yorkshire rum is distilled onsite and we are one of only a handful of distilleries in the uk who actually distill their own rum. our yorkshire original vodka is distilled from yorkshire grown winter wheat, the finest wheat in the world. our gin is certified as organic by the organic food federation and vegan approved by the vegetarian society. like most of the good things in life, the spark to give life to an organic gin was born from a woman, with a little help from a man. the story behind our branding and label artwork is all about the celebration of our home, wakefield and the wider yorkshire region. wakefield is prized for its forced rhubarb, the rich history in mining, textiles and manufacturing.
business_tags: distillery | distillery tours | cocktails | botanicals | spirits & cocktails | certified organic | animal production | vegan friendly | organic food | organic certification | coal mining | gift boxed | gold and silver | bottle label | custom bottles | custom artwork | label artwork
generated_description: forged spirits, legally known as forged spirits ltd., is a craft spirits company based in wakefield, england. founded in january 2019 by victoria and gary ford, the company specializes in producing organic and vegan-certified gin, vodka, and rum. forged spirits uses high-quality, organic ingredients sourced globally and adheres to strict organic and vegan standards. the company's products are certified organic by the organic food federation and vegan approved by the vegetarian society. forged spirits is notable for distilling its own rum onsite, using bonsucro-approved molasses, and for its commitment to fair labor practices.
generated_business_tags: organic food federation accredited | organic certified gin producer | luxury spirits production | certified organic | distillation processes | vegan-friendly vodka
